newsArray.title: ऑस्ट्रेलिया छोड़ इस छोटे देश की टीम का कप्तान बना ये खिलाड़ी, भाई की मौत के बाद लिया फैसला
creator: TV9 Bharatvarsh
newsArray.description: ऑस्ट्रेलिया के एक खिलाड़ी ने इस साल अपने देश को छोड़ने का फैसला किया था. ये खिलाड़ी अब एक छोटे देश की टीम के लिए खेलता है. इस खिलाड़ी को अब अपनी नई टीम का कप्तान भी बना दिया गया है. ये खिलाड़ी अपनी नई टीम के लिए अभी तक 5 टी20 मैच खेल चुका है.

newsArray.title: IPL 2025: Full List Of Head Coaches For All 10 Teams
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: All coaches in IPL 2025: The two-day IPL 2025 auction in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, saw a record-breaking Rs 639.15 crore spent. A total of 21 players were sold for Rs 10 crore or more, a big increase compared to just 11 players in the 2022 mega auction.Rishabh Pant became the most expensive player, fetching Rs 27 crore, closely followed by Shreyas Iyer at Rs 26.75 crore. With the mega auction concluded, excitement is now building for IPL 2025 season, as fans, players, and coaching staff prepare for the upcoming tournament.Apart from captain and star players, coaching staff plays an important role in success of any IPL team, and that's why all 10 franchises have enlisted cricketing legends from around the world to guide their squads. Here's a look at the head coaches of all 10 IPL teams for IPL 2025 season:Royal Challengers Bangalore: Andy Flower, appointed as head coach last season, will return for IPL 2025 to lead RCB.Chennai Super Kings: Stephen Fleming, a long-time associate of CSK, will continue as head coach in IPL 2025, having served the team both as a player and coach.Delhi Capitals: After parting ways with Ricky Ponting, Delhi Capitals appoint Hemang Badani as their new head coach.Mumbai Indians: Mahela Jayawardene returns as head coach, replacing Mark Boucher. Jayawardene has previously coached MI as well.Gujarat Titans: Ashish Nehra, who became GT's first-ever head coach in IPL 2022, will retain his role for the 2025 season.Punjab Kings: Australian legend Ricky Ponting takes on the role of head coach for Punjab Kings in IPL 2025.Kolkata Knight Riders: Chandrakant Pandit, a veteran of domestic cricket, takes over as KKR’s head coach for IPL 2025.Sunrisers Hyderabad: Daniel Vettori, former New Zealand spinner, serves as the head coach of SRH for IPL 2025.Rajasthan Royals: After his tenure with the Indian team, Rahul Dravid rejoins Rajasthan Royals as their head coach for IPL 2025.Lucknow Super Giants: Former Australian coach Justin Langer, who joined LSG last season, will continue his role as head coach.

newsArray.title: 9 टू 5... फॉर्मल ड्रेस, क्रिकेट से संन्यास के बाद गेंदबाज कर रहा बैंक की नौकरी
creator: News18 Hindi
newsArray.description: क्रिकेट के संन्यास के बाद खिलाड़ी अलग अलग काम करने लगते हैं. कोई क्रिकेट कोच बन जाता है तो कोई कॉमेंट्री करने लगता है. कहने का मतलब है कि भले वो ऐक्टिव क्रिकेटर की लिस्ट से दूर हो जाता है लेकिन किसी ना किसी बहाने इस खेल से जुड़ा रहता है. टीम इंडिया के पूर्व तेज गेंदबाज सिद्धार्थ कौल उनमें से अलग हैं. इस पूर्व तेज गेंदबाज ने एसबीआई में नौकरी शुरू कर दी है.

newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: "पानी में बत्तख की तरह..." राहुल द्रविड़ ने पिंक बॉल टेस्ट से पहले ऋषभ पंत को लेकर कही बड़ी बात
newsArray.description: Rahul Dravid Reaction on Rishabh Pant: पूर्व मुख्य कोच राहुल द्रविड़ का मानना ​​है कि भारतीय क्रिकेट टीम में महेंद्र सिंह धोनी के संन्यास से पैदा हुई कमी को ऋषभ पंत ने तुरंत भर दिया जिन्होंने टेस्ट क्रिकेट को ऐसे अपनाया जैसे 'बत्तख पानी को अपनाती' है.

newsArray.title: U-19 Asia Cup 2024: ಶಾರ್ಜಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಿಕ್ಸರ್​ಗಳ ಮಳೆಗರೆದ 13 ವರ್ಷದ ವೈಭವ್
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: Vaibhav Suryavanshi: ಐಪಿಎಲ್ 2025 ರ ಮೆಗಾ ಹರಾಜಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಎಲ್ಲರ ಗಮನ ಸೆಳೆದಿದ್ದ ವೈಭವ್ ಸೂರ್ಯವಂಶಿ ಅಂಡರ್-19 ಏಷ್ಯಾಕಪ್​ನಲ್ಲಿ ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ತಮ್ಮ ಬ್ಯಾಟಿಂಗ್ ಮೂಲಕ ಎಲ್ಲರ ಗಮನ ಸೆಳೆದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. 13ರ ಹರೆಯದ ವೈಭವ್ ಸೂರ್ಯವಂಶಿ ಯುಎಇ ವಿರುದ್ಧ 6 ಸಿಕ್ಸರ್​ಗಳ ಸಹಿತ ಬರೋಬ್ಬರಿ 76 ರನ್ ಕಲೆಹಾಕಿದರು.

newsArray.title: IPL 2025: Full List Of Head Coaches For All 10 Teams
creator: ABP News Bureau
newsArray.description: All coaches in IPL 2025: The two-day IPL 2025 auction in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia, saw a record-breaking Rs 639.15 crore spent. A total of 21 players were sold for Rs 10 crore or more, a big increase compared to just 11 players in the 2022 mega auction.Rishabh Pant became the most expensive player, fetching Rs 27 crore, closely followed by Shreyas Iyer at Rs 26.75 crore. With the mega auction concluded, excitement is now building for IPL 2025 season, as fans, players, and coaching staff prepare for the upcoming tournament.Apart from captain and star players, coaching staff plays an important role in success of any IPL team, and that's why all 10 franchises have enlisted cricketing legends from around the world to guide their squads. Here's a look at the head coaches of all 10 IPL teams for IPL 2025 season:Royal Challengers Bangalore: Andy Flower, appointed as head coach last season, will return for IPL 2025 to lead RCB.Chennai Super Kings: Stephen Fleming, a long-time associate of CSK, will continue as head coach in IPL 2025, having served the team both as a player and coach.Delhi Capitals: After parting ways with Ricky Ponting, Delhi Capitals appoint Hemang Badani as their new head coach.Mumbai Indians: Mahela Jayawardene returns as head coach, replacing Mark Boucher. Jayawardene has previously coached MI as well.Gujarat Titans: Ashish Nehra, who became GT's first-ever head coach in IPL 2022, will retain his role for the 2025 season.Punjab Kings: Australian legend Ricky Ponting takes on the role of head coach for Punjab Kings in IPL 2025.Kolkata Knight Riders: Chandrakant Pandit, a veteran of domestic cricket, takes over as KKR’s head coach for IPL 2025.Sunrisers Hyderabad: Daniel Vettori, former New Zealand spinner, serves as the head coach of SRH for IPL 2025.Rajasthan Royals: After his tenure with the Indian team, Rahul Dravid rejoins Rajasthan Royals as their head coach for IPL 2025.Lucknow Super Giants: Former Australian coach Justin Langer, who joined LSG last season, will continue his role as head coach.

newsArray.title: 9 टू 5... फॉर्मल ड्रेस, क्रिकेट से संन्यास के बाद गेंदबाज कर रहा बैंक की नौकरी
creator: News18 Hindi
newsArray.description: क्रिकेट के संन्यास के बाद खिलाड़ी अलग अलग काम करने लगते हैं. कोई क्रिकेट कोच बन जाता है तो कोई कॉमेंट्री करने लगता है. कहने का मतलब है कि भले वो ऐक्टिव क्रिकेटर की लिस्ट से दूर हो जाता है लेकिन किसी ना किसी बहाने इस खेल से जुड़ा रहता है. टीम इंडिया के पूर्व तेज गेंदबाज सिद्धार्थ कौल उनमें से अलग हैं. इस पूर्व तेज गेंदबाज ने एसबीआई में नौकरी शुरू कर दी है.

creator: News18
newsArray.description: BCCI has refused to send Indian team to Pakistan for the next year's Champions Trophy with ICC suggesting PCB to host the tournament in hybrid model.

newsArray.title: IND vs AUS: "पानी में बत्तख की तरह..." राहुल द्रविड़ ने पिंक बॉल टेस्ट से पहले ऋषभ पंत को लेकर कही बड़ी बात
newsArray.description: Rahul Dravid Reaction on Rishabh Pant: पूर्व मुख्य कोच राहुल द्रविड़ का मानना ​​है कि भारतीय क्रिकेट टीम में महेंद्र सिंह धोनी के संन्यास से पैदा हुई कमी को ऋषभ पंत ने तुरंत भर दिया जिन्होंने टेस्ट क्रिकेट को ऐसे अपनाया जैसे 'बत्तख पानी को अपनाती' है.

newsArray.title: U-19 Asia Cup 2024: ಶಾರ್ಜಾದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಿಕ್ಸರ್​ಗಳ ಮಳೆಗರೆದ 13 ವರ್ಷದ ವೈಭವ್
creator: TV9 Web Team
newsArray.description: Vaibhav Suryavanshi: ಐಪಿಎಲ್ 2025 ರ ಮೆಗಾ ಹರಾಜಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಎಲ್ಲರ ಗಮನ ಸೆಳೆದಿದ್ದ ವೈಭವ್ ಸೂರ್ಯವಂಶಿ ಅಂಡರ್-19 ಏಷ್ಯಾಕಪ್​ನಲ್ಲಿ ಮತ್ತೊಮ್ಮೆ ತಮ್ಮ ಬ್ಯಾಟಿಂಗ್ ಮೂಲಕ ಎಲ್ಲರ ಗಮನ ಸೆಳೆದಿದ್ದಾರೆ. 13ರ ಹರೆಯದ ವೈಭವ್ ಸೂರ್ಯವಂಶಿ ಯುಎಇ ವಿರುದ್ಧ 6 ಸಿಕ್ಸರ್​ಗಳ ಸಹಿತ ಬರೋಬ್ಬರಿ 76 ರನ್ ಕಲೆಹಾಕಿದರು.

newsArray.title: Ben Stokes questions ICC on over-rate calculations
newsArray.description: Stokes’ comments on the over rate came after both England and New Zealand were fined three points each from their World Test Championship tally for maintaining slow over rate during the first Test in Christchurch.
